name: Slime Together (Curtis McQuarrie)
description:
Game made for the 2021 Brackeys Gam Jam!

The goal is very simple, survive! Collect slime companions (green cubes) to get grow larger, regain health, and deal more damage. Attack the enemy slimes (red cubes) and avoid getting hit.

This was my attempt at the theme, Stronger Together. This was my second attempt at making a game and first Game Jam! I learnt a lot and
